column2:
"It's too bad about that last rock you
brought back, <%me>."

"I guess I jumped to conclusions when she
showed interest in the Floating Continent. I thought it
meant more than it did. I'm very sorry."

"I hate to ask you for another favor, but
Matoi seems really interested in the
crystal-like Dragonkin that live there."

"It's another long shot, but... If at all possible,
could you go there and bring back something
that's related to them?"

"Please, for Matoi's sake. Whenever you
have time is fine."
